entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 12:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure: 103.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain in the afternoon. Blowing snow late in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
